string-array.name: data_description
string-array.item: Kiwi is a small, green fruit with a fuzzy skin. It has a sweet and tart flavor and is a good source of vitamins C and K.
Orange is a citrus fruit with a bright orange color. It has a sweet and sour flavor and is a good source of vitamin C.
Mango is a tropical fruit with a yellow or orange skin. It has a sweet and creamy flavor and is a good source of vitamins A and C.
Apple is a round fruit with a red, green, or yellow skin. It has a sweet or tart flavor and is a good source of fiber.
Pear is a round fruit with a brown or green skin. It has a sweet or tart flavor and is a good source of fiber.
Strawberry is a small, red fruit with a sweet and tart flavor. It is a good source of vitamin C and fiber.
Durian is a large, spiky fruit with a strong, sweet and savory flavor. It is native to Southeast Asia and is a popular ingredient in Thai cuisine.
Soursop is a large, green fruit with a creamy, sour and sweet flavor. It is native to Central and South America and is a popular ingredient in Caribbean cuisine.
Lemon is a small, yellow fruit with a sour flavor. It is a good source of vitamin C and is used in a variety of dishes and drinks.
Dragon fruit, also known as pitaya, is a tropical fruit native to Mexico, Central America, and South America. It is a member of the cactus family and has a colorful, spiky exterior.

string-array.name: data_nutrition
string-array.item: Kiwi is rich in vitamin C, vitamin K, and dietary fiber. It also contains antioxidants and a good amount of potassium.
Oranges are an excellent source of vitamin C and provide a good amount of fiber. They also contain antioxidants like flavonoids.
Mangoes are high in vitamin C, vitamin A, and dietary fiber. They also contain compounds like beta-carotene and antioxidants.
Apples are a good source of dietary fiber and vitamin C. They also contain antioxidants and natural sugars.
Pears offer dietary fiber, vitamin C, and potassium. They are low in calories and provide a good amount of hydration.
Strawberries are rich in vitamin C, manganese, and antioxidants. They are also low in calories and high in water content.
Durian is a good source of energy due to its carbohydrate content. It also provides dietary fiber, vitamin C, and potassium.
Soursop is rich in vitamin C, fiber, and antioxidants. It also contains compounds with potential health benefits.
Lemons are a great source of vitamin C and antioxidants. They also contain citric acid and have alkalizing effects on the body.
Dragon fruit is rich in vitamin C, fiber, and antioxidants. It\'s also low in calories and provides several types of beneficial plant compounds.

string-array.name: data_fact
string-array.item: Kiwi originated in China and was originally known as the Chinese gooseberry
Oranges belong to the citrus family and are known for their tangy and sweet flavor.
Mangoes are often referred to as the "king of fruits" and come in various varieties with unique flavors.
There are thousands of apple varieties worldwide, each with its own color, flavor, and texture.
Pears come in different shapes and colors, and they belong to the same family as apples.
Despite their name, strawberries are not true berries but rather aggregate fruits.
Durian is known for its strong aroma, which people either love or find off-putting. It\'s often referred to as the "king of fruits."
Soursop has a spiky green outer appearance and a soft, white, and fibrous inner flesh. It\'s known for its unique flavor.
Lemons are used not only for culinary purposes but also for their fragrance and cleaning properties.
Dragon fruit, also known as pitaya, comes in different varieties with distinct outer skin colors and inner flesh colors, such as white or pink.
